Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2012 01:51PM dclure45 wrote: Last May my mammogram came back and my doctor suggest getting another one done, and then they did the ultra sound. they found a spot about 1cm the doctor told me to come back in 6mos. I did that today. Now this radiologist says he thinks it's just the cysts? Well I am concerned on how do you know for sure? That it isn't nothing to be worried about. He said that I would need to come back again in another 6mos. Is this something that I don't need to wait around on and get it checked out sooner?
Posts.Title: Scared and feeling unlucky chrissera marjie
